strapiPost.title: Amazeum Hosting Multiple Events For Students
strapiPost.content:
Spring Break is sneaking up, and local organizations are jumping on the opportunity to entertain and educate your kids while theyâ€™re out of school. The Scott Family Amazeum is hosting a Spring Break camp among other events this month. 

  • Camp: The Academy of Superheroes and Villains will be on March 21-25 at the Amazeum for kids 6-11. During the camp, kids will have a crack at their forensic abilities, probe at their problem-solving skills as heroes, and explore the ins and outs of concealing as villains.
  • Tinkering tomorrow: There is a homeschool day tomorrow, March 2, for students to explore the science and technology of light by tinkering with LEDs, prisms, and more!
